thread.title: EastEnders spoilers: Huge week revealed as Michelle Fowler’s affair sparks explosive disaster
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoilers: Huge week revealed as Michelle Fowler’s affair sparks explosive disaster

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: EastEnders spoilers: Huge week revealed as Michelle Fowler’s affair sparks explosive disaster
text:
(Picture: BBC) EastEnders is lining up explosive scenes for Michelle Fowler as her secret affair with younger lover Preston is finally exposed – with dramatic consequences that could change life in Walford forever. In the weeks since Preston showed up in Walford, Michelle has been unable to resist him – but in the short times when they have been apart, he has also seduced Bex Fowler. 
Now the webs of secrets and lies are about to unravel as the truth about Michelle’s lover is exposed and, as Michelle loses control, her world falls apart in spectacular fashion that has shocking outcomes for several residents of the Square.
(Picture: BBC) With Preston announcing that he and Bex are officially a couple, Michelle is consumed by jealousy and struggles to cope with seeing the pair together. She warns Martin that Preston isn’t right for Bex but while Martin warns his daughter to be careful, he tries to support her relationship.
(Picture: BBC) At a 60s night at the Vic, where Bex performs, things get out of hand as Michelle’s secret unravels. It remains to be seen how the truth comes out but one thing we can guarantee is that it is just the catalyst for high drama in an unforgettable week in Walford.

Michelle’s life falls apart and as she faces up to the fallout, her actions lead to big events that send shockwaves through the Square – and so guarded by secrecy are the week’s stories, we can’t tell you any more.
(Picture: BBC) While we are tight lipped over what unfolds on the Square, we can assure you that you won’t want to miss these episodes…
One to watch: Tuesday 28th March at 7:30pm on BBC One.
